APP.TITLE: Tune
APP.LOGIN_FAILED_MSG: Sorry, your login failed. Please try again.

LANDING_CONTENT.DESCRIPTION:
Swipe to find new music,
based on your favourite Spotify tunes.
LANDING_CONTENT.SUB_DESCRIPTION:
Swipe right to save a tune in your Spotify 'Liked Songs'.
The track will be used to find more recommendations.
If you don't like the track, swipe left.
